source_caption: Table 6: Depth estimation results on the test split of the NYUv2 dataset. relative to other published methods, for both depth prediction and completion tasks. Note that the same model was used in both submissions, the only modification being the input information (RGB for prediction and RGB+D for completion). \dagger - results from [42].
